name: AIKEN - SEARCH OF THE CRYSTAL
description:
AIKEN IS A INDIE GAME DEVELOPED BY CHINTU_DEV. AIKEN IS SET IN A PLACE OF EXTREME WEATHER CONDITION AND FOOD SHORTAGE. AIKEN THE PROTAGONIST GET IN A MISSION TO SEARCH FOR A CRYSTAL TO STOP THE WEATHER CONDITION AND SAVE THE WORLD.

GET THE WEATHER CRYSTAL TO SAVE THE WORLD!!!

HAVE FUN PLAYING XD
